carrier.body:
Blog
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom
ARC Newsletter

ARC is pleased to announce the activation of United Airlines' New Distribution Capability (NDC) on the ARC settlement platform. Through this partnership, ARC will provide United with payment flexibility for NDC transactions, allowing for acceptance of cash and card payments while providing a consistent settlement experience for travel agencies.

Learn More

2021 ARC Partificipating Airline Fees

2021 airline participation monthly fees and transaction fees will remain unchanged. A $0.25 adverse market surcharge will remain in effect for all 2021 settlement transactions.

 

Access the FAQs

Reminder: Settlement Schedule Change In Effect

ARC’s draft and disbursement day has changed from Friday, five days after the sales week closes, to the following Wednesday, 10 days after the sales week closes. This change went into effect for PED 03/29/20 and will repeat weekly until further notice. A visual representation of these changes can be found here, and a list of FAQs is available here.

login.ads: Welcome to My ARC
login.body:
What is NDC & how does it work? At today’s @ASTAAgents Corporate Advisory Committee Meeting, ARC’s VP of Product, Doug Mangold, answers these questions & gives a comprehensive view of #NDC in the air travel industry. Learn more about ARC supporting NDC

Learn More

Despite devastating hurricanes in late 2017, air ticket purchases to areas less impacted remain very strong in 2018. Overall, average ticket prices decreased 4% #ARCdata #SpringBreak

Learn More

The theme for this year’s TravelConnect is “Transforming Together” and will feature Dan Clay, Wayne Best and Holly Hegeman. #TravelConnect2018

Learn More

touroperator.body:
Blog
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom

Airline Refund and Exchange Information

Important information regarding airlines that have chosen to directly manage refunds, have reinstated refunds in the GDS; and those that have extended ARC’s Processing Validity beyond the standard 13 months.

Learn More

ARC, in collaboration with Expedia, has released the 2021 Travel Trends Report, which analyzes extensive travel data from Expedia and ARC to uncover key search and booking trends for travelers.

Top insights in the report include money-saving strategies for purchasing travel, evolving traveler priorities, and trending destinations in key global markets.

Read the Report

agency.body:
Blog
TAC
Events & Webinars
ARC Newsroom

2021 Annual Location Fees Will Be Drafted on January 21, 2021

2021 ARC travel agency location fees will be drafted from designated bank accounts on January 21, 2020. Any bank account changes or voluntary deletions will need to be completed by January 7, 2021. Additional 2021 fee information can be found here.

 

Access the FAQs

ARC launched an upgraded accreditation tool to keep pace with the way agencies do business. Make agency profile updates and submit change requests anytime and from anywhere.

Learn More

Airline Refund and Exchange Information

Important information regarding airlines that have chosen to directly manage refunds, have reinstated refunds in the GDS; and those that have extended ARC’s Processing Validity beyond the standard 13 months.

Learn More

Reminder: Settlement Schedule Changes in Effect

ARC’s draft and disbursement day has changed from Friday, five days after the sales week closes, to the following Wednesday, 10 days after the sales week closes. This will repeat weekly until further notice. Click here or more information.

Annual Agency Affirmation

Once a year you must review and affirm key information about your agency. Please note, you must disable your pop-up blocker, have Adobe Flash installed and have access to the Accreditation tool in order to complete the Affirmation.

Affirm Now
